'''John Bach''' (born [[5 June|June 5]], [[1946]]) is a Welsh-born New Zealand actor. He played [[Madril]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]''.

His surname is pronounced "Baitch".
